question: You are planning to organise your high school class reunion. For that, write a letter toyour friend to invite him/her to the reunion.You should include the following in your letter:• when and where the party is• give some details about what is going to happen at the party• tell him/her what you have been doing recently
text: I hope this letter finds you in the pink of health. I am penning down this letter to make you aware that our high school class reunion is planned for March 15th. It would be great if you also join our party. I would like to elucidate copious motives in forthcoming paragraphs.

To begin with, the first notion, A team of 5 members including myself are working on activities which will be part of the programme. Secondly, we are inviting our school staff and principal madam. In addition to this, there are a few fun events where everyone would be involved. for instance, The European school fun programme strategies we are cultivating as their agenda has very creative thoughts and it enhances the productivity and entertainment for us with much ease, efficacy and convenience. Furthermore, an extremely delicious food buffet was arranged covering both vegetarian and non-vegetarian items. Lastly, The programme ends with the prize distribution to the toppers of physical games. Now, I am working as a software engineer in one of the top multinational companies in Bangalore. However, I took 3 days of planned leave to attend this function.
Should you have any concerns or further clarifications, please do not hesitate to call on my mobile. Looking forward to hearing from you.
